Quiere seguir con sus ventas por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo artesanías en joyas y mercadería. En el futuro quiere establecer un negocio formal.
texts.en:
Cristina is a hard-working woman who has many projections for growth, since she sells merchandise and jewelry. At the present time she already has customers who buy her merchandise.

Little by little she has increased her sales volume, and for this reason she wants to continue with her business of selling hand-crafted jewelry.

She wants to continue with her sales, and so she wants to use the loan to buy handcrafted jewelry and merchandise. In the future she wants to establish a formal business.

loans.use: to buy hand-crafted jewelry.

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en:
Nadia is a 23-year-old married woman and a mother of one child.

Nadia is requesting a youth loan of 400 JOD to purchase new furniture for her home with an aspiration of purchasing a new house and improving her family's living income.

Due to cultural issues, Nadia was not willing to upload her picture on the internet so the man in the photo is Nadia's husband.

loans.use: to purchase new furniture for her home.

loans.name: Reem

texts.en:
Reem is a 19-year-old single lady from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Reem has a home-based business through which she provides her family with a modest income to help them cover their needs.

Reem is selling clothes and she is requesting a youth loan of 400 JD to purchase more quantities of clothes.

Reem is looking to customize a room at her home for her sales purposes and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for trading purposes.

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en:
Alaa is a 19-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Alaa is requesting a youth loan of 500 JD to do home maintenance with an aspiration of improving her family's living conditions and increasing their living standards.

Due to cultural issues, Alaa doesn't want to have her picture uploaded on the internet so the man in the picture is her husband.

loans.use: to do home maintenance

loans.name: Heba

texts.en:
Heba is a 28-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of one child.

Heba is trading in clothes and she is requesting a youth loan of 400 JD  to purchase more quantities of clothes.

Heba is looking to open a shop for her clothes and purchasing her dream family house.

loans.use: To purchase clothes for trading purposes.

loans.name: Zayed

texts.en:
Zayed is a 28-year-old man from Baqa'a, Amman, Jordan and he is a bridegroom. 

Zayed is requesting a youth loan of 1500 JD to finance part of his wedding expenses with an aspiration of purchasing his own house.

loans.use: to finance part of his wedding expenses.

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es: Edilberto con su credikiva reacondiciono su carro donde vende café y compró 12 termos, su negocio se ve más elegante, se incrementaron las ventas pues tiene mayor cantidad de productos para la venta. Con su credikiva actual comprará en insumos y en refrescos para responder a la temporada de Carnaval que se avecina y en la cual planea lograr el exito de su inversión. Así mismo comprará mercancia para que su esposa venda tambien y generen mayores ingresos. Edilberto trabaja persistentemente porque tiene el sueño de adquirir su propia casa. Su mensaje a los financiadores es el siguiente: "Gracias a ustedes he podido mejorar mis condiciones de trabajo y espero contar con su ayuda en el futuro." "Me siento muy contento por los servicios recibidos y agradezco la oportunidad de generar nuevos ingresos para la familia. "
texts.en: Thanks to his previous loan, Edilberto has fixed the cart he uses to sell coffee and he bought 12 thermos; his activity has gained a more elegant look and his sales have increased because he has more products to sell. The loan he is currently requesting will be used to buy ingredients and drinks to meet the requests during the approaching Carnival season, when he plans on profiting from his investment. He will also buy some products for his wife to sell, in order to earn more money. Edilberto persistently works to fulfill his dream of buying a house of his own. This is message to the lenders: “Thanks to you I have been able to improve my working conditions, and I hope to keep on counting on you in the future. I am very happy about the services I have received and I am thankful for this new opportunity to earn more money for my family”.

loans.use: To buy ingredients and drinks for his activity and some other products that his wife will sell.

loans.name: Oscar Danilo

texts.es:
Oscar es un hombre casado sin hijos, que vive con su esposa en Latacunga que es la capital de la provincia de Cotopaxi, ubicada a una hora y media de la ciudad de Quito. Es una acogedora ciudad, con estrechas calles adoquinadas, resaltadas por los vivos colores de las típicas fachadas de sus viviendas y el polvoriento paisaje circundante. Latacunga viene de dos voces quichuas llacata kunka que significa Dios de las Lagunas. Cuando llega noviembre sus empedradas calles se llenan de alegría por la celebración de la fiesta en honor a la Virgen de las Mercedes, se trata de la ceremonia de la “Mama Negra”, que simboliza la fertilidad y la productividad de la tierra.

El es taxista, oficio que lo aprendió de su padre. Nos cuenta que se casó a muy temprana edad y que su mayor sueño es poder terminar su carrera universitaria. Ahora su meta es poder sacar su licencia profesional y para ello necesita un crédito. Esto ya que en Ecuador el curso de "chofer profesional" y en sí, los documentos que solicitan resultan ser muy costosos y Oscar no los puede pagar en una sola vez. Con su licencia profesional espera poder trabajar a nivel interprovincial, teniendo así mayores ingresos. Sus clientes han demandado este servicio y Oscar al no tener esta licencia de manejo especial no los puede atender. Es su primer crédito y está muy optimista ya que con ello podrá ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Oscar is a married man without children who lives with his wife in Latacunga, the capital of the province of Cotopaxi, located an hour and a half from the city of Quito.  It is a friendly city with narrow cobbled streets highlighted by the vivid colors of the typical facades of their homes and the dusty surrounding landscape.  Latacunga comes from two Quechua words, "llacata" and "kunka," 'Dios de las Lagunas' [God of the Lagoons]. When November arrives, the paved streets fill with happiness for the celebration in honor of the Virgen de las Mercedes, or the ceremony of the Mama Negra, who symbolizes fertility and the productivity of the land.

He is a taxi driver, a job he learned from his father.  He tells us that he got married at a young age and that his biggest dream is to be able to finish college.  Now his goal is to get his professional license and for this he needs a loan because in Ecuador the "professional driver" course itself and the paperwork required happen to be very expensive, and Oscar is not able to pay for them all at once.  With his professional license he hopes to be able to work interprovincially, to have greater income.  His customers have asked for this service and Oscar is not able to take care of them without this special driver's license.

This is his first loan and he is very optimistic because with it he will be able to offer his customers better service.

loans.use: to pay for his professional driver's license.

loans.name: Paula Karina

texts.es:
Paula de 31 años, comenzó con unas pequeñas cosas en su pequeña tienda que estaba ubicada en la parte delantera de su casa. Poco a poco en un año a variado la mercadería que ha vendido y obteniendo mas clientela. 

Esta  comenzando a trabajar desde las 06h00 debido a la demanda de clientes que tiene en el sector hasta las 21h00 todos los días de la semana.  Quiere seguir con su negocio porque ha ayudado a sus hijos en sus estudios. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar enlatados, granos, carnes, bebidas etc.
texts.en:
Paula is 31 years old, she started her activity by selling small items in the small corner shop located at the back of her house. Little by little, in the space of one year, she has varied the products she was selling, thus gaining more customers.

She has started working form 6 am owing to her customers’ requests, and she works until 9 pm every day of the week. She wants to keep on running her activity because it has been a great help in paying for the education of her children. For this reason she is requesting a loan to buy canned food, basic grains, meat and drinks among other products.

loans.use: To buy canned food, basic grains, meat and drinks.

loans.name: Bertha Azucena

texts.es:
En la ciudadela La California de  Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Las Divinas.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Bertha, tiene 48 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos mayores de edad, la última de sus hijas aun vive con ella. Su marido es profesor.
 
Ella trabaja en el Municipio de Portoviejo y también se  dedica al comercio, vende  ropa de todo tipo y maquillajes, su forma de venta es bajo pedidos, trabaja en sus ventas los fines de semana  y por las  noches, también vende en su lugar de trabajo ya que sus mejores clientas son sus compañeras de trabajo, ella deja a crédito y cobra cada quince días, su mercadería la compra en Guayaquil ciudad a la que viaja cada vez que necesita. Lleva más de 10 años dedicada a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar  ropa de todo tipo y maquillajes. Lleva tres años en el banco y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos.
 
Su meta es tener una boutique.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Las Divinas" meets every 15 days in the La California neighborhood of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabi, known for many years as the "City of the Royal Tamarinds."  

Here we meet Bertha, who is 48 years old, married, and has 3 grown children.  Her youngest daughter still lives with her. Her husband is a teacher.

Bertha works for the municipality of Portoviejo, and also has a business selling all types of clothing and makeup.  She makes her sales by taking advanced orders.  She works on the weekends and also in the evenings.  She also sells in her place of work, because her best customers are her work colleagues.  Bertha sells on credit, and she collects every 15 days.  She buys her merchandise in Guayaquil, a city that she travels to whenever she needs products.  She has been doing this business for 10 years, and it is going very well.

This loan will be used to buy all types of clothing and makeup.  Berta has been with her communal bank for 3 years, and she likes it because of the help that she has been given through these loans.

Her goal is to have her own boutique.

loans.use: to buy clothing and makeup

loans.name: Amparo De Jesus

texts.es: A sus 57 años, la señora Amparo se dedica a la venta de productos cosméticos como lociones, cremas de mano y perfumes por catálogo, con esta actividad lleva 15 años trabajando todas las tardes y fines de semana recorriendo barrios de la ciudad de Medellín ofreciendo sus productos y consiguiendo nuevos clientes. Debido a sus percances de salud, la señora Amparo no trabaja desde hace un mes, actualmente se encuentra mejor de salud por lo que requiere de la compra de mercancía con la cual pueda reactivar su negocio y tener la oportunidad de cumplir su sueño de tener su propio almacén para no tener que desplazarse caminando por la ciudad.
texts.en: Amparo, 57, has been selling cosmetics such as lotions, hand creams and perfumes through a catalog for 15 years.  She works afternoons and weekends going around the different neighborhoods of Medellin, offering her products and getting new customers.  Because of a minor accident, Amparo hasn’t worked for a month but now she is better and needs to buy merchandise so that she can reactivate her business and fulfill her dream of having her own store so that she doesn’t have to keep walking through the city.

loans.use: to buy body creams and perfumes

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es: Maria Esperanza  su negocio al que ejerce es a la venta de mercadería en general, es una emprendedora  que ha luchado por tener su propio negocio, sus metas es ahora de tener bien surtido su negocio de variedad de mercadería, no es su primer crédito, el anterior lo ocupo para invertir  en el negocio en la compra de mercedaria que le estaban solicitando sus clientes. Maria Esperanza está solicitando financiamiento para comprar mercadería ropa, zapatos, camisas, ropa para niños, cosméticos entre otros productos.
texts.en: Maria Esperanza sells general merchandise. She is an entrepreneur who has striven to run her own activity, and her current goal is to keep her store well-supplied with a variety of products. This is not her first loan: she invested the previous one in the purchase of products for her shop according to her customers’ requests. Maria Esperanza is now requesting a loan to buy products such as clothes, shoes, shirts, children's clothes and cosmetics among other products.

loans.use: To buy clothes, shoes, shirts, children's clothes and cosmetics among other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy electrical appliances to continue building up her business and filling customer orders.

loans.name: Shirley Victoria

texts.es:
Shirley de 42 años, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchas aspiraciones en los años próximos de prosperar en su pequeña tienda.

Comenzó con el negocio vendiendo pequeñas cosas poco a poco comenzó a tener ingresos. Ahora ella trabaja en su tienda vendiendo víveres variados y papelería.  

Tiene muchas aspiraciones por eso quiere continuar su tienda. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar vivieres para la tienda como bebidas, juguetes, perfumes, cremas, confites etc.
texts.en:
Shirley is 42 years old, and she is a hardworking woman with a great ambition to see her small shop grow in the coming years.

She started her activity by selling small things and little by little she started making money. She now works in her shop where she sells different items of food and stationery.

She has many goals and for this reason she wants to keep on running her shop. She is consequently asking for a loan to buy products for her shop such as drinks, toys, perfumes, creams and jams among other products.

loans.use: To buy drinks, toys, perfumes, creams and jams.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cosmetics, earrings, chains and rings to sell.

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en:
Abeer is a 40-year-old widow from Irbid, Jordan.

Abeer has her own beauty salon and she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to expand the salon by purchasing some equipment. Abeer is looking to add a skin treatment section to her salon and purchasing a car.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for her salon

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cosmetics products and accessories for trading purposes

loans.name: Beneranda Poderosa

texts.es:
En la ciudadela La California de  Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Las Divinas.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Beneranda, tiene 55 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos dos mayores de edad y la menor de 17 años, todos sus hijos aun viven en su casa, las dos menores estudian en universidad y colegio. Su esposo  trabaja en Jipijapa en un centro de estudios.

Ella es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudar a sus hijas en sus estudios se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y de productos de Avon y Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja todos los  días de  dos a tres horas diarias, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene más de 6 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
 	
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y ropa de todo tipo. Este es el tercer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los pagos son fáciles de hacer. 

Su sueño es ver que sus hijas sean profesionales.
texts.en:
The city La California de Portoviejo, capital of Manabí, has been known for many years as the city of the Royal Tamarind Trees. The members of the communal bank Las Divinas meet every fifteen days. 

Here we find Beneranda. She is 55 years old and married, and she has 3 children, two who are grown and one minor who’s 17 years old. All of her children live in her home; the two youngest study in college and university. Her husband works in Jipijapa in a study center. 

She is a housewife who, in order to have her own resources and be able to help her children in their studies, sells a variety of types of clothes as well as Avon and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women’s accessories). She works every day for 2 to 3 hours. She sells her products on credit and collects every 8 days. She has been doing this for more than 6 years, and it’s going very well. 

This loan is to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and various sorts of clothes. This is the loan cycle in the communal bank, and she likes it because the payments are easy to make.  	

Her dream is to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and clothes.

loans.name: Miriam Maria

texts.es:
Miriam es una persona que es conocida en su sector por ser muy trabajadora y dispuesta a salir adelante. Desde hace aproximadamente 29 años empezó con un pequeño negocio donde vendía recipientes desechables, y poco a poco este negocio ha ido creciendo y ha ido diversificando los productos que ofrece a sus clientes. Miriam afirma que ella aspira a tener un negocio muy grande, donde todas las personas lo tengan como referente y este negocio le genere grandes ingresos. Por el momento el negocio tiene unas ventas muy inconstantes, por lo que Miriam debe alternar la venta de recipientes desechables con la venta de helados. La gran ventaja es que Miriam desempeña esta actividad desde su casa y puede estar al tanto del cuidado de su familia. 
Con el ánimo de afrontar una temporada en la que Miriam manifiesta que sus ventas se incrementan considerablemente, Miriam requiere surtir su negocio y comprar más mercancía de productos desechables, sin embargo, actualmente no cuenta con el capital suficiente para hacerlo, por lo que Miriam aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de la mercancía de recipientes desechables y pueda estar preparada para la temporada donde sus ventas se incrementan notablemente.
Miriam aspira a que cuando sus ingresos se incrementen, estos le permitan mejorarles la calidad de vida a las personas de su familia.
texts.en:
Miriam is a person known in her neighborhood for being very hardworking and willing to get ahead.  Approximately 29 years ago she began with a small business where she was selling disposable containers.  Little by little this business has grown and she has diversified the products she offers to her customers.

Miriam affirms that she is aspiring to have a very big business in which everyone has her as a reference, and this business will generate a large income for her.  For the time being the business has unstable sales, so Miriam has to alternate selling disposable containers with selling ice cream.  The big advantage is that Miriam does this job from home and can be on top on taking care of her family.

With the intention of facing a season in which Miriam says her sales go up considerably, Miriam needs to supply her business and buy more merchandise of disposable products.  However, currently she does not have sufficient capital to do it.  This is why Miriam is striving for a loan, to give her the possibility of managing to buy the disposable containers so she can be prepared for the season in which her sales go up notably.

Miriam hopes that when her income goes up she will be able to improve the quality of life of the people in her family.

loans.use: to buy plastic containers for the season in which her sales increase.

loans.name: Abdul Razak

texts.en:
This is 37-year-old Abdul.  He is married and has two children aged 8 (class 5) and 4. He has no additional dependents. 

In 2002, Abdul established his computer accessories business. He began his business after he obtained a diploma in Computer Studies but could not secure a job. Working 7 days a week and 8 hours a day, he earns about Le 2,000,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000 to buy computer accessories which are in high demand in offices around his shop. This will increase his turnover and his profit. 

His greatest challenge is that computer items are imported which means you should have foreign currency which is not easily accessible. He intends to further his education in computer studies and to educate his children to university level. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy computer accessories.

loans.name: Arlett Del Socorro

texts.es: Muy pronto se realizarán la fiesta del Carnaval de Barranquilla y todos en la ciudad se preparan para divertirse como cada uno quiera.  Los empresarios  surten sus negocios,  para responderle a sus clientes, con bebidas, comidas, artesanías, disfraces, carrosas y verbenas, en torno a la popularidad que emana de los ciudadanos de la ciudad y de turistas locales e internacionales; como un solo bloque estas fiestas del caribe colombiano llenas de color  y de acción logran que la gente  se aliste para deleitarse y desinhibirse  disfrazándose,  comprando y bailando. Esto es justamente lo que aprovechan los emprendedores como Arlett, que con su negocio de  venta de refrescos y bebidas frías, planea tener un buen surtido para que sus utilidades en esta temporada se incrementen, aprovechando el derroche de alegría de sus clientes. Su negocio nació justamente del carnaval de Barranquilla, cuando en el año 1989, vendía todos los productos de la empresa Bavaria,  en todos los eventos del Carnaval dela ciudad y en las fiestas de los municipios de los departamentos, para ello no necesitaba de capital de trabajo, pues los productos se los entregaban mediante el sistema de consignación, es decir los que no vendía podía devolverlos. Aquí aprendió a trabajar independientemente y poco a poco con su trabajo y sus ahorros,  logró comprar cervezas, gaseosas y poni maltas por cajas,  que vendía al detal; gradualmente con el incremento de su capital de trabajo,  logró comprar en mayor cantidad y así mismo vender al  mayor. En la actualidad nuevamente se prepara para responder a esas  festividades   y debe estar muy bien dotada de todo lo que la alegría de sus clientes le exige. Esta es la razón  por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará cervezas en mayor volumen, para venderlas en las diferentes festividades  y desde su propia vivienda contagiando a quien la conoce de mucha alegria.
texts.en:
Soon they will celebrate Carnival in Barranquilla, and all the people in the city are preparing to enjoy themselves, each in his or her own way. The merchants are stocking their businesses, so that they can respond to their customers' requests with beverages, foods, handicrafts, costumes, parade floats and fairs, because of the popularity of the festival with the citizens of the city and the local and international tourists. As a single block, these festivals of the Colombian Caribbean, full of color and action, enlist the people to enjoy themselves and lose their inhibitions, wearing costumes, buying, and dancing. 

This, as it happens, is what the business people like Arlett take advantage of, with her business of soft drinks and cold beverages. She plans to have a good stock so that her profits increase during this season, taking advantage of the extravagance of happiness of her customers. As it happens, her business was born out of the Barranquilla Carnival, when, in the year 1989, she was selling all the products of the Bavaria company at all the Carnival events in the city and in the township festivals in the districts. To do this, she didn't need any working capital, since they gave her the products on the consignment system, that is, she could return what she didn't sell. There she leaned to work independently, and little by little, with her work and her savings, she managed to buy beer, soft drinks, and Pony Malt (a non-alcoholic malt beverage) by the case, which she sold retail. Gradually, with the increase in her working capital, she managed to buy in larger quantities and also to sell wholesale. Now she is preparing again to respond to these festivities and she should be very well stocked with everything that the happiness of her customers requires of her. This is the reason she has turned to her Kiva loan, the first financing she has had from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will buy beer in large volume, to sell at the various festivities and from her own home, infecting those who know her with much happiness.

loans.use: to buy beer in large volume.

loans.name: Aida Silvia

texts.es: La señora Aida Silvia es una persona ya grande de edad que es viuda desde hace unos años, de la manera que percibe ingresos es por medio de dos pensiones que se le deposita en largos periodos. Por tal motivo ella se ve en la necesidad de solicitar el apoyo en esta institución para arreglar la electricidad de su vivienda,  ya que los cables  están muy viejos y algunos están quemados, los enchufes no le funcionan y por la fuerza que hace la luz le sale muy alta. Por tal motivo quiere arregla la energía eléctrica antes de que el problema se agrave y pueda pasar algún accidente. Para realizar su proyecto necesita comprar cables, cintas y pagar al electricista.
texts.en:
Aida Silvia is an older person who has been a widow for a few years.  She receives her income from two pensions that are deposited for her over long periods.  For this reason she sees the need to request help from this institution to fix the electricity in her home.  The wires are very old and some are burned.  The plugs do not work and the bill is very high for her because the light has to struggle.  This is why she wants to fix the electricity before the problem gets worse and an accident occurs.

To do her project she needs to buy wires and tape and pay the electrician.

loans.use: to buy wires to fix the electricity in her house.

loans.name: José Del Rosario

texts.es:
En la fotografia, aparece el señor José junto con su esposa la señora Guillermina.

El señor José, tiene 46 años de edad, es casado con una hijastra.

Él es agricultor y tiene conocimientos de albañilería, vive con su esposa y su hijastra en una casa de adobe y baharaque, dentro de la misma propiedad viven otros familiares como su suegro, cuñados, tíos y demás familia pero en casas separadas, en total son 11 personas, todos son agricultores y contribuyen para la economía del hogar.

Don José inicialmente era obrero de albañilería, pero por la necesidad tuvo que aprender las actividades agrícolas y tener maíz para su familia, fue su papá quien le enseño estas actividades. Desde hace tres años, José alquila un terreno en donde cultiva 3,500 metros cuadrados y la producción es de 12 matates de maíz como mínimo.

Don José solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para mejorar su vivienda como son el reconstruir las paredes de la vivienda, por que están rajadas y construir una habitación para su hijastra ya que la casa no tiene habitaciones, ya que es muy pequeña y la casa estará en mejores condiciones para que soporte el invierno.
texts.en:
In the photograph, José appears with his wife, Guillermina.

José is 46 years old. He is married and has one stepdaughter.

He is a farmer and he also knows how to do masonry work. He lives with his wife and his stepdaughter in a house made of adobe with wood framework. Other family members live on the same property, including his father-in-law, brothers-in-law, uncles and other family members, but in separate houses. In total there are 11 people, all of whom are farmers and who contribute to the household economy.

José started out as a masonry laborer, but out of necessity he had to learn farming activities and grow corn for his family. It was his father who taught him how to do this. For three years José has rented a piece of land where he plants 3,500 square meters and has a minimum production of 12 sacks of corn.

José is requesting the loan from Fundación Campo to improve his house. He wants to rebuild the walls of the house because they are cracked and also to build a room for his stepdaughter because the house doesn’t have bedrooms because it is very small. This would put the house in better conditions to withstand the rainy season.

loans.use: to rebuild the walls of his house and also to build a room for his stepdaughter

loans.name: Noé Eduardo

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal La Unión Hace La Fuerza. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar vive el señor Noé, tiene 42  años de edad, está soltero y vive en la casa de sus padres. Este es su cuarto ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda y  por las facilidades para conseguir los créditos.

El tiene una pequeña tienda de comestibles en la casa de su papá, vende de todo desde arroz, azúcar, hasta carne, pescado, legumbres y  ciertos remedios y artículos de bazar, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00.  Tiene su negocio por más de 2 años y que gracias a los créditos que ha recibido hasta la fecha él ha podido ir poco a poco  surtiendo más su tienda.
 
Este crédito es para surtir su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, atún, detergentes y otros productos de primera necesidad.

Su sueño es tener un negocio más grande.
texts.en:
The members of the communal bank “La Union Hace La Fuerza” [Unity Makes Strength] meet every 15 days in the cantón of Rocafuerte. This place is known for its delicious sweets, which are made by the people there and which are famous throughout the country. 

This is where Noé lives. He is 42 years old. He is single and lives in his parent’s house. This is his fourth loan cycle in the communal bank and he likes it for the support and for the terms of the credit.

He has a small grocery store in his father’s house. He sells everything, from rice and sugar to meat, fish, vegetables and some medicines and some other household items. He works every day from 6:00AM until 8:00PM. He has had his business for more than 2 years. Thanks to the loans he’s had, he’s been able to better stock his store over time. 

This loan is to stock his store. He will buy rice, sugar, tuna, detergents, and other items of daily use. His dream is to have a larger business.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, tuna, detergents, and other items of daily use

loans.name: Marcelo Martin

texts.es:
Marcelo tiene 56 años es muy algre y carismatico, tienen 2 hijos cuyas edades comprenden 18 y 21 años, y actualmente se encuentra estudiando en la universidad y por los cuales se siente muy orgulloso ya que los ha sacado adelante ya que por motivos muy ajenos se separo de su pareja. Marcelo en sus tiempo libre le gusta jugar al futbol sobre todo cuando tiene alguna precoupacion ya que lo distrae y evita que tenga mal humor, como buen peruano que ama nuestra comida, su palto favorito es el "Arroz con Pato". Marcelo solo estdudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar Mecanica Automotriz.

Marcelo se dedica al servicio de taxi (transporte) por las calles de la ciudad desde hace ya 17 años, trabaja alrededor de 9 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 35 clientes por dia, el cree que le va bien en su negocio debido a que tiene una tarifa comoda y porque le gusta colaborar con sus cliente cuando llevan muchas bolsas o cuando tienen bebes en brazo y por ello los clientes se sienten a gusto.

Marcelo esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada el podra comprar llantas y realizar un mantenimiento a su vehiculo, con esta mejorar el tendra un vehiculo en buen estado y sobre todo por seguridad tanto de el como de sus clientes, con ello podra ahorrar para poder cumplir su mas garnde sueño:" que sus hijos terminen su carrera y sean profesionales"
texts.en:
Marcelo is 56 years old.  He is very happy and charismatic.  He has 2 children, ages 18 and 21, who are currently studying at the university.  He is very proud of them and that he has helped them get ahead.  He is separated from his wife.  In his free time, Marcelo likes to play soccer, especially when he is worried, because it distracts him and prevents him from being in a bad mood.  Like a good Peruvian, he loves Peruvian cuisine.  His favorite meal is "Arroz con Pato", rice with duck.  Marcelo only completed school through the 5th year of secondary school, but he would have really liked to study to be an Auto Mechanic. 

Marcelo has had a taxi (transportation) service in the city streets for 17 years.  He works around 9 hours a day and may have up to 35 customers per day. He thinks his business is doing well because he has a good fare and because he likes to help his customers when they have a lot of bags or if they are carrying a baby, and for this reason his customers are pleased. 

Marcelo is very thankful to Kiva lenders since thanks to them he will be able to purchase tires and do maintenance on his vehicle.  With these improvements he will have a car in good conditions that above all will be safe for him and his customers.  With this loan he can save for his greatest dream, that his children complete their educations and become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase tires and maintenance for his vehicle.

loans.name: Baatar

texts.en: Mr. Baatar, 38, is a taxi driver. He has been running his taxi for many years. He lives with his family in the ger district (a Mongolian traditional nomadic tent district) in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Before this, he used to provide passenger transportation by minivan around the districts of the city. Last summer he changed to a taxi business. In this field, he has permanent customers and makes repairs every three months. But lately, his car has been damaged too much and some of the parts are basically broken. Therefore, he needs a loan to purchase new spare parts from the big auto market for the full renovation of his car.

loans.use: To purchase new spare parts from the big auto market for the full renovation of his car.

loans.name: Otgonbaatar

texts.en: Mr. Otgonbaatar, 35, is a taxi driver. He has been running a taxi for 3 years. He lives with his family in the ger district (a Mongolian traditional nomadic tent district) in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Last autumn, he changed his car for a new one to expand his business opportunities. He believes that a good taxi is most important for successful improvement of the business. Currently he has many permanent customers. But lately his car has been damaged too much and some of parts are basically broken. Therefore, he needs a loan to purchase new spare parts for the full renovation of his taxi car.

loans.use: to purchase new spare parts for the full renovation of his taxi car.

loans.name: Eliani

texts.es:
La señora Eliani   vive en una localidad en donde se camina media hora, ella es casada con el señor Ezequiel  con quien procreo un hijo  que tiene doce meses.

     Ella solicito el préstamo para  invertir en la compra  y venta de ropas en donde lleva trabajando  un  año en la que comenta que le va bien ya que con ello a mejorado mucho sus ingresos para su hogar.

    Inicio por si sola ya que también quiere apoyar a su esposo con los ingresos de la casa y darle lo más necesario a su  pequeño hijo que esta creciendo.

      Lo  que  más desea  es que  con esta pequeña actividad y el préstamo ella pueda seguir trabajando y su negocio crezca cada día  mas.
texts.en:
Sra. Eliani lives in a place one can cover in a half hour’s walk She is married to Sr. Ezequiel with whom she has a 12 month-old son.

She requested a loan to invest in buying and selling clothing, work she has been doing for one year. She notes that it is doing well and that it has greatly increased her household’s income.

She started her business herself because she wanted to support her husband by supplementing household income and to provide everything possible for her small, growing son.

What she most wants with this small business and the loan is to be able to continue working so that her business will grow more each day.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to stock her clothing store.

loans.name: Marina Floricelda

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal La Unión Hace La Fuerza. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Marina. Tiene 40 años de edad, mantienen una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo tres años. Su marido trabaja en una camaronera.

Ella tiene una pequeña  tienda de comestibles en su casa,  allí vende desde arroz, azúcar, carne, pescado camarón, queso y también  vende ciertos remedios y artículos de bazar, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 18h00. También vende aguas, colas y helados, trabaja sola y le gusta su negocio ya que allí se gana algo sin tener que descuidar a su pequeño hijo,  ella tiene su negocio por más de 5 años y le ha ido muy bien.

Este crédito es para surtir su tienda, para comprar arroz, azúcar, atún, detergentes y otros productos de primera necesidad. Es socia fundadora del banco Comunal, es la tesorera del grupo y le gusta el Banco ya que gracias a los créditos ella ha podido poco a poco ir mejorando su negocio.
 
Su sueño es tener un negocio más grande.
texts.en:
The members of La Unión Hace La Fuerza Communal Bank meet every fifteen days in Rocafuerte canton. This place is known throughout the country for the delicious sweets prepared by the inhabitants.

Here we meet Sra. Marina, who is 40 years old and lives in a common law relationship from which she has a three year old son. Her husband works on a shrimp fishing ship. 

She has a small grocery store in her house where she sells rice, sugar, meat, shrimp, cheese and also certain household remedies and trinkets. She works every day from 6 a.m. until 6 p.m. She also sells water, colas and ice cream. She works alone and she enjoys her business since she is able to earn something without having to neglect her small son. She has had her business for more than five years and it has been doing very well.

This loan is to stock her store by buying rice, sugar, tuna, detergents and other essential items. She is a founding member of the communal bank and is the treasurer. She enjoys the bank since thanks to the loans she has been able to improve her business, little by little.

Her dream is to have a larger business.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, tuna, detergents and other basic necessities.

loans.name: Leobardo

texts.es: Leobardo de 48 años es casado tiene 2 hijos que dependen de él, hace 22 años inicio con su negocio de mantenimiento de electricidad a la maquiladoras donde poco a poco fue adquiriendo clientes por lo que tuvo que contratar personal para que le ayudara con los trabajos. Por el uso que realiza con su herramienta de trabajo alguna ya se está deteriorando por lo que necesita comprar nueva, de esta manera el no tendrá que detener el trabajo a causa de alguna que le falte por lo deteriorada. Leobardo es quien sustenta los gastos del hogar por tal motivo pide el apoyo para comprar la herramienta y seguir sosteniendo los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Leobardo is 48, married, and has two children who depend on him. He started his business 22 years ago, doing electrical maintenance work for maquiladoras (assembly plants). 

Liitle by little, he began getting customers, so he had to hire people to help him with his jobs. Through use, some of his work tools are now wearing out, so he needs to buy new ones. This way he won't have to stop work because of any tools he lacks due to their poor condition. 

Leobardo is the one who provides the financial support for his household. For this reason, he is asking for the loan to buy tools, so that he can continue supporting his household.

loans.use: To buy tools for his business.

loans.name: Mamanazar

texts.ru: Маманазар проживает в районе Шахритус. Возраст,  55 лет. Женат. Имеет троих детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается животноводством. В этой области он десять лет. Кредит берет для закупа крупнорогатого скота с целью увеличения их количества.
texts.en: Mamanazar lives in the Shahrituz area.  He is 55 years old, married, and has three children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Mamanazar is involved in animal husbandry.  He has been living in this region for the past ten years.  He is taking a loan in order to purchase cattle and increase his herd.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Saidboy

texts.ru: Мастер на заказ сварщик Саидбой, женатый мужчина, отец четырёх детей. Он раньше был учеником у своего отца, и научившись делу стал самостоятельным сварщиком. Его доход еле хватает на жизнь, а ему необходимо купить новый сварочный аппарат. Узнав у знакомых , что возможно купить в кредит, подал заявку на займ. Саидбой надеется, что с новым аппаратом  у него не будет проблем при работе.
texts.en: Saidboy is a freelance welder.  He is married and the father of four children.  After learning his trade from his father he became an independent welder.  His income is barely enough to live by and he needs to buy a new welding machine.  Having learned from acquaintances that it is possible to buy on credit, he has applied for a loan.  Saidboy hopes that with a new machine, he will no longer have problems at work.

loans.use: to buy a welding machine.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HATUNCHASKAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio tiene 77 años de edad, casado y tiene 5 hijos; el socio es cesante del sector público, él socio es una persona bien alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar adelante en esta ocasión el socio solicitan el préstamo para invertir en su vivienda, él socio hará algunos arreglos en su vivienda.
El socio solicita el préstamo para revestir su vivienda.
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "HATUNCHASKAS", which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

He is 77, married, has five children, and used to work for the public sector.  He is cheerful and responsible, and very determined to get ahead.  The loan he is currently requesting is to invest in his home, since he would like to renovate his home.  He is happy with the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To renovate his house.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: Luisa es socia del Banco Comunal Pureza, tiene 42 años, es dueña de una Pirotecnia y una Orquesta, es madre de 4 hijos, desde que es socia siempre se esforzó en todo lo que se ha dedicado, las capacitaciones le ayudaron a poder ser mas responsable, y puntual, también le ayuda para poder criar a sus hijos, y en la relación con su esposo, siente que ha progresado, cada día ve el progreso que tiene y se siente muy bien con las cosas que pudo obtener, gracias a los préstamo fáciles que le daban ella se pudo comprar un terreno y hacer su casa, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima para su negocio.
texts.en: Luisa is a member of the communal bank "Pureza".  She is 42 and the owner of a fireworks business and an orchestra.  She has four children.  Ever since she became a member she has worked hard in her business.  The training has helped her become more responsible and punctual, and also has helped her raise her children.  She feels she has progressed in her relationship with her husband and every day she notices how many things she has been able to achieve.  Thanks to the easy-term loan she was able to buy land and build a house.  The current loan will be used to buy supplies for her business.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her business.

loans.name: Francisca Elena

texts.es: Francisca es socia del Banco Comunal Paloma, tiene una tienda de abarrotes, es madre de 5 hijos, ella es Técnica en Enfermería, siempre tuvo la tienda y con su esposo la administraban hasta que ella empezó a viajar y solo su esposo lo administraba, cuando empezó en Finca Perú su esposo estaba en total desacuerdo, nunca le daba para que ella pueda ahorrar, con el tiempo se dio cuenta que Finca le ayudaba mucho con los préstamos, y ahora hacen metas para poder destinar los ahorros que tiene en Finca, da gracias por todo el apoyo que siempre le dieron ,  las capacitaciones le ayudaron a que la relación con su esposo pueda mejorar, esta muy bien con su negocio, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en al compra de azúcar, arroz y leche.
texts.en: Francisca is a member of the Paloma community bank.  She has a grocery store and is the mother of five children.  She is a registered nurse.  She has always had her grocery store and used to run it together with her husband until she started to travel and then only her husband would run it.  When she started with Finca Peru her husband was dead set against the idea.  He would never give her money so that she could save.  Over time, she realized that Finca helped her a lot with their loans and now she and her husband establish goals that they can accomplish with the savings they have with Finca.  Francisca gives thanks for all the support that she has been given.  The training sessions helped her to improve her relationship with her husband.  She is doing very well with her business and she will invest her current loan in buying sugar, rice and milk.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice and milk

loans.name: Diana

texts.es: Diana es socia del Banco Comunal Paloma, tiene 39 años, vende CDs en las ferias, es madre de 6 hijos, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 3 años, y en esos años aprendió acerca de la responsabilidad, puntualidad y como criar a sus hijos, recuerda que empezó con la semilla y poco a poco le daban mas préstamos, así fue construyendo su casa, y haciendo crecer su negocio. Daiana esta muy satisfecha con todo lo que pudo lograr siendo socia de Finca Perú, ahora ya aumentó sus puesto de CD y trabaja con sus hijos. El préstamo que solicita lo utilizará en abrir una tienda de abarrotes en sus casa.
texts.en: Diana is a member of the Paloma community bank.  She is 39 years old and sells CDs in street markets.  She is the mother of six children and has been a member of Finca Peru for three years.  Over these years, she has learned about responsibility, punctuality, and how to raise her children.  She remembers that she started out receiving seed fund money and gradually received more loans.  This helped her to build her house and grow her business.  Diana is very satisfied with everything that she has been able to achieve as a member of Finca Peru.  She has increased her CD sales and works with her children.  Diana is requesting this loan to open a grocery store in her home.

loans.use: to open a grocery store in her home

loans.name: Juana Jeannette

texts.es: Juana es una emprendedora que ha salido adelante con sus negocio con mucho esfuerzo a emprendido este negocio. Ella ya ha tenido crédito con Fundación León 2000, lo cual ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y con un record  crediticio muy bueno, ella nos cuenta que con el financiamiento aumento su inventario y sus clientes de igual manera. Juana actualmente está solicitando crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, jugos, detergentes, sopas y pan entre otros productos.
texts.en: Juana is an entrepreneur who has gotten ahead with her business. She learned this business with a lot of hard work. She has already had a loan with Fundación León 2000. She has shown herself to be a responsible person with a good credit history. She tell us that the loan increased her inventory and her customers as well. At this time, Juana is asking for a loan to invest in the business to buy basic grains, snacks, soft drinks, juices, detergents, soups, bread and other products.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, snacks, soft drinks, juices, detergents, soups, bread and other products.

loans.name: Sabina Alejandra

texts.es: Sabina es socia del Banco Comunal Paloma, tiene 39 años, ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, es madre de 3 hijos, es conviviente y socia de Finca Perú desde hace 4 años, en su Banco Comunal le enseñan como hacer un buen negocio, la responsabilidad, la puntualidad y la solidaridad, también como criar a sus hijos, el progreso que tuvo en parte es gracias a los préstamos recibidos y también al esfuerzo que ella puso, de eso esta muy agradecida, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes para su tienda.
texts.en: Sabina is a member of the Paloma community bank.  She is 39 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children.  Her business is selling groceries.  Sabina has been with Finca Peru for four years.  Her community bank has taught her how to build a good business.  It has also taught her responsibility, punctuality, solidarity, and how to raise her children.  The progress that she has made is partly thanks to the loans that she has received and partly thanks to the hard work that she has put in.  She is very grateful for this.  Sabina will invest the loan that she is requesting in buying groceries for her store.

loans.use: to buy groceries for her store

loans.name: Julia Xiomara

texts.es: Julia Xiomara es una emprendedora con perseverancia que con mucho esfuerzo a creado su propia herramienta de trabajo que es su propio negocio, su ventas la realiza de forma ambulante ya tiene definido a sus clientes en el cual les ofrece los productos. Ella en la actualidad nos expresa que le va muy bien en el negocio ya que han aumento sus clientes y que además tiene bastante mercadería que ofrecerles. Julia está solicitando crédito ya que tiene algunos encargos listos para sus clientes lo cual comprara variedad de mercadería en general.
texts.en: Julia Xiomara is an entrepreneur who has perseverance. With a lot of hard work, she has created her own work, which is her business. She sells as a street vendor and has regular customers to whom she offers her products. At this time, she tells us that it is going very well for her in her business, since the number of customers has increased and she also has a lot of merchandise to offer them. Julia is asking for a loan since her customers have ordered some things. She will buy a variety of general merchandise.

loans.use: to buy a variety of general merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” HATUNCHASKAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia tiene 56 años de edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de artesanía ella se dedica a la compra y venta de chompas, polos, cerámicas entre otros siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia, la socia trabaja de forma ambulatoria repartiendo su mercadería a sus clientes que le solicitan
La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de una impresora para su hijo que necesita.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "Hatunchaskas" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

The member is 56 years old, married, and has three children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling handicrafts.  She buys and sells sweaters, tops, ceramics and other products.  This is how she provides for her family.  She works as an itinerant vendor, delivering her merchandise to customers who request it.

The member is requesting this loan to buy a printer that her son needs.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy a printer that her son needs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more sugar, salt, cooking oil and wheat flour

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.en:
Rodrigo is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 2 children.

Rodrigo is providing motorcycle with sidecar services in the community. He has had this business for 6 years. He requested a loan for 10,000 PHP to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the service.

Rodrigo has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Rodrigo hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the service

loans.name: Howell

texts.en:
Howell is 27 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married and has one child.
 
Howell has a computer shop that provides Internet and online computer games. He has had this business for three years. 

He requested a loan for 18,000 PHP to buy tools and pay for the electricity for the services.

Howell has been a member of HSPFI for since 2008. In the future, Howell hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for the electricity for the services.

loans.name: Luz De Luna Brillante Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LUZ DE LUNA BRILLANTE” iniciará su segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Collpani, está compuesta por once integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Alicia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de ollas, tienda de barrio, venta de jeans, elaboración de abarcas de goma, electricista, venta de comida, elaboración de picota y chuntillo, venta de golosinas.

La señora Alicia,  indica que hace mas de cinco años que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de su amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de dulces que viene trabajando hace años.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de dulces) que comprará la Ceja  y posteriormente lo venderá en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella tiene tres hijos y vive en concubinato.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el ahorro.
texts.en:
The “Luz de Luna Brillante” (Light of the Shining Moon) communal bank will start their second cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Collpani regional office.  It is comprised of 11 members, and it is directed by a board of directors, which is headed by Alicia.  The businesses that the members of the communal bank carry out are varied such as selling pots, neighborhood store, selling jeans, making rubber sandals, electrician, selling food, making cherry treats and chutney, and selling sweets.

Alicia says that she has worked with Pro Mujer for over five years.  She became a member of the institution by invitation from a friend.  She currently has a business selling sweets, which she has been doing for years.  The loan that she will now take out is to increase her capital (to buy sweets).  She will buy the sweets in La Ceja, and later she will sell them at her stand.  This way of working allows her to generate resources to support her family.  She has three children and a life partner.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer she answered that she likes the saving.

loans.use: to buy sweets.

loans.name: Shadrack

texts.en: Shadrack, a 31-year-old married boda boda (motorcycle) operator in Shanzu, Mombasa, has been ferrying people with his motorcycle for the past two years. This will mark his third business loan from KADET LTD, which he will use to purchase an additional motorcycle. Shadrack, who hopes to have a more profitable, successful business, will use the anticipated additional profits to furnish his house.

loans.use: to purchase an additional motorcycle.

loans.name: Purity

texts.en:
Purity is 41 years old, married, and has three children. She  runs a retail shop and has been in this business for three years earning a monthly income of 15,000 KES. 

Purity is requesting for a loan for 30,000 KES, which she will use to buy more tea leaves, sugar, and soft drinks to sell. The profit earned from the business will help her pay fees for her children. Her dreams are to invest into other businesses and see that her family is financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase tea leaves, sugar, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase dairy cows

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Eusebio Luis

texts.es: Luis es un emprendedor que inicio su propio su negocio que es un taller de bicicleta en el cual el servicio y la calidad que brinda es muy bueno por que sus clientes lo visita, él desde muy joven trabaja para apoyar a su familia en los gastos del hogar. Este negocio lo prende de forma empírica y por la necesidad de generar ingresos y la falta de empleo pero le gusta su negocio y lo realiza con dedicación para que sus clientes lo visiten nuevamente. Luis está solicitando financiamiento para comprar variedad de repuestos de bicicleta y ofrecerle a sus cliente.
texts.en: Luis is an entrepreneur who started his own bicycle shop business where he offers very good quality and service.  This is why his customers come to him.  He has worked since he was very young to help support the family with the household expenses. He taught himself this business as he wasn't employed and needed to generate some income.  He likes this business and works with dedication so his customers come back.  Luis is requesting a loan to buy a variety of bicycle parts to offer his customers.

loans.use: buy a variety of bicycle parts.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es: La socia Marisol; la socia continua con su negocio de compra y venta de artefactos, la socia sigue viajando y trayendo novedades a los clientes y amigos en general; la socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de artefactos que le han hecho pedido como radios, televisores, licuadoras en general. La socia   solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de artefactos.
texts.en: Marisol continues with her business buying and selling appliances.  She continues to travel and bring back novelties to her customers and friends in general.  On this occasion, she wants to use the loan to buy appliances she has orders for like radios, television sets, blenders in general.  She’s asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of appliances.

loans.use: to buy appliances.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 33 years old, married and a mother of six children. She has been selling fish for the last 9 years, with a monthly income of 30,000 KES. 

She was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer. She is applying for her second loan of 80,000 KES from KADET LTD, which she intends to use to add additional stock of fish for sale. 

She will save the anticipated profit and help pay school fees for her children. In the future, Esther hopes to grow her business and own a fish depot in the area.

loans.use: to add fish stock for sale

loans.name: Tsolmonbaatar

texts.en: Tsolmonbaatar lives with his parents, sisters and brothers in southern Mongolia. Since 2001, he has earned a living by running an inter-city taxi service. Five times a week, he travels from his town to the capital, a distance of 250 km. He works hard, and was able to buy a new car some time ago. He is applying for a loan for 1,500,000 MNT to buy spare parts for this car so that he can continue to provide uninterrupted service to his customers.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his taxi.

loans.name: Eugenio

texts.es:
El Sr. Eugenio tiene 47 años, está casado con la señora Idalina, cuentan con dos hijos pequeños que aun están en la escuela.
El se dedica a la construcción, y cuenta que empezó en esto como ayudante de su padre quien le enseño la profesión.  Trabaja generalmente con Arquitectos e Ingenieros, y cuenta que ya ha realizado varios trabajos de construcción en varios lugares, cuenta con su propia gente para realizar los trabajos, es decir que ellos siempre lo llaman cuando hay algún proyecto importante. Comenta que su sueño es que sus hijos estudien y que terminen alguna carrera  en la Universidad ya que el no tuvo la misma suerte.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de piedras trituradas, con que podrá utilizar en una de las obras que hace. Agradece a la fundación y a Kiva por la oportunidad que le está dando.
texts.en:
Eugenio, 47, is married to Idalina and they have two young children who are still attending school.  He works in construction and he relates that he started out helping his father who taught him the profession.  

He usually works with architects and engineers and he relates that he’s already done various construction jobs in different places.  He has his own people to do the jobs, that is, they always call him when there’s an important project.  He comments that his dream is that his children study and complete a career in the university since he did not have the same luck.

He’s asking for the loan to buy crushed rock to use in one of the projects he has.  He thanks the Fundación and Kiva for the opportunity he’s being given.

loans.use: to buy crushed rock.

loans.name: Manaf

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 20 years old, single, and lives with three family members.

Since 2010, Manaf has owned a store where he sells mobile phones and accessories. He has sufficient experience in this field and has a deep understanding of local consumers.  He is also well known in the surrounding areas.

He decided to apply for a loan of $2400 in order to put in a sliding door and advertising light box and to redecorate his store. His goal is to earn more profits, which will give him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to put in a sliding door and advertising light box and to redecorate his store.

loans.name: Hamisi

texts.en: Hamisi is 30 years old and the father of three children. For the last year, he has earned a living by running a local cafe and now earns about KES 20,000 a month. He was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer, and is applying for his second loan, for KES. 20,000, to buy more food items, plates and utensils to use in his business. He will use the additional income made possible by this loan to pay his children's school fees. His goals for the future are to expand his cafe and eventually open a hotel.

loans.use: to buy food and other supplies for a cafe.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 24 years old, single, and lives with seven family members.

Ali is a carpenter.  In 2002, he opened his own workshop where he makes and sells furniture. He has more than ten years of experience in this field, a good reputation, and a deep understanding of local consumer needs. He is also well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a loan of $3000 in order to purchase wood working machinery. His goal is to earn more profits, which will give him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to purchase wood working machinery.

loans.name: Omar Enrique

texts.es: Omar invirtió su anterior credikiva en la compra de una vitrina calentador, accesorios para el negocio y la compra de cerdo, negocios con los cuales le fue bien. Por eso ahora se prepara para recibir su segundo credikiva,  porque quiere   comprar  un molino eléctrico, con el cual le ayudaría mucho en su discapacidad porque  facilitará su trabajo,  y daría mayor eficiencia. También comprará   cerdo  en mayor volumen, porque en las fiestas carnavaleras,  la gente consume mucho este producto.  Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente:    “Estoy muy agradecido con esas personas que nos han ayudado para seguir adelante en nuestro negocio y aspiro a que continúen ayudándonos para poder ampliarlo.”
texts.en: Omar used his previous Kiva loan to buy a heated display case, accessories for his business and to buy pork.  He did well in all the businesses.  Because of that, he’s now preparing to receive his second Kiva loan because he wants to buy an electric meat grinder that will help him quite a bit with his disability because it will make his work easier and more efficient.  He will also buy pork in greater amounts because during the Carnival festivities people consume much of this product.  His message to Kiva lenders is the following: “I am very grateful to the people who have been helping us to get ahead with our business and I hope they will continue to help us expand it.”

loans.use: to purchase an electric meat grinder and pork in larger quantities.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela tiene 55 años de edad, es una mujer empeñosa y trabajadora, además de ser amable y cordial. Está separada de su esposo, pero vive en compañía de sus 03 hijos a quienes quiere mucho, habitando juntos en su propia casa. Las a actividad que realiza Ángela, es la venta de ropas y zapatos de damas y caballeros,  para lo cual realiza viajes periódicos cada mes a la ciudad de Lima donde realiza sus compras buscando los mejores precios y modelos, y luego venderlos entre sus amistades. Asimismo vende uniformes policiales donde tiene bastante pedidos de los jóvenes cadetes de la escuela de policiales de su localidad. Tiene más de 4 años realizando esta actividad y con la ayuda de su hija han hecho crecer su negocio, por tanto comparten las ganancias. Le gusta su negocio pues le genera ingresos económicos para solventar los gastos de su hogar y la educación de su hijos, por quienes se siente orgullosa de haberlos sacado adelante. Este será el préstamo número 01 con la institución MFP, por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Además de sentirse a gusto con banco comunal pues considera a  su grupo ser unido y solidario. Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de ropa y juguetes de la ciudad de Lima buscando los precios más bajos y así tener mayores ganancias, ya que cuenta con pedidos por entregar.
texts.en:
Ángela, 55, is a dedicated, hardworking woman who besides is kind and cordial.  She’s separated from her husband but lives with her three children who she loves very much.  They live together in their own house.  

The activity that Ángela carries out is the sale of clothes and shoes for women and men.  To do so, she makes periodic trips each month to the city of Lima where she makes her purchases looking for the best prices and styles which she then sells among her acquaintances.  She also sells police uniforms when she has enough orders from young cadets in her local police academy.  She’s been in this activity for more than 4 years and with help from one of her daughters has made the business grow so they share profits.  She likes her work because it generates income to cover household expenses and her children’s education that she’s very proud for having raised.

This will be her first loan with MFP so she hopes for your collaboration to reach her goals.  She also feels very comfortable in her communal bank because she considers the group to be united and supportive.  She will use the requested 800 new soles to buy clothes and toys in the city of Lima seeking the lowest prices so that her profits will be grater since she has pending orders to fill.

loans.use: to buy more clothes.

loans.name: Yuris Mercedes

texts.es: Yuris con su anterior credikiva compró útiles escolares, ropa interior infantil y productos de aseo personal. En la actualidad se acerca una vez mas la temporada de ingreso de los estudiantes a escuelas, colegios universidades y nuevamente invertirá en útiles escolares para responder a esta temporada y hacer de su inversión todo un éxito. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: " Muy agradecida por la ayuda recibida que la vida les recompense con bienestar y salud para ustedes y sus familiares. "
texts.en: Yuris used her previous Kiva credit to buy school supplies, children's underwear, and personal hygiene products.  Now, the time for students to start schools, colleges, and universities is approaching, and she needs to reinvest in school supplies to meet to the seasonal demand and make a success of her investment.  She has the following message to Kiva's lenders:  "I am very grateful for the help I have received, and I hope that life will reward you and your families with health and wellbeing."

loans.use: to invest in school supplies to meet seasonal demand.

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar is a married man with eight children, all of whom attend school. He owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees for his children.

For the past fifteen years, he has operated a "boda boda" (motorcycle) transport business. He also operates a timber selling business, which is his other source of income. He faces a major challenge of lack of timber for sale.

With the Kshs 80,000 he wants to purchase a power saw for cutting timber for sale. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase a power saw for cutting timber for sale.

loans.name: Evans

texts.en:
Evans is a forty-nine-year-old man from the Chavakali area of Vihiga Town, in the west of Kenya. He is married to Mary and they have four children who depend on them.

Evans operates a shop selling plumbing materials like water pipes, taps and many assorted plumbing materials, a business he has done for the last year, making a monthly income of KES. 21,000. 

He is taking a 2nd loan from KADET LTD which he will use to buy a stock of plumbing materials. He plans to plow back  his profits into the business. His dream is to continue expanding his business via KADET loans.

loans.use: To buy stock of plumbing materials.

loans.name: Erisa

texts.en: Erisa used the previous loan to buy coffee to sell. He still has challenges of  price fluctuations, hyper-inflation and the seasonal nature of the crop. However his desire is owning a coffee store. Erisa needs the loan to buy coffee to sell as he targets this season.

loans.use: to buy  coffee to sell.

loans.name: Senia Yamileth

texts.es:
En la fotografía aparece la señora Senia junto a su pequeño hijo.

La señora Senia tiene 34 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos niños, uno de 5 años de edad y otro de 16 meses de edad.

Senia vive con sus hijos y con su mamá, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de productos básicos en su casa, además Senia elabora yuca frita, pasteles, tostadas, enchiladas, panes, las que sale a vender todos los días a pie de casa en casa, para llevarle el sustento diario a su familia.

Antes Senia se dedicaba a trabajar como empleada domestica, pero después pensó en instalar una pequeña tienda en su casa y le ha resultado muy beneficioso ya que obtiene buenas ganancias. Con el apoyo de su mamá se decidió por salir a vender yuca frita, pasteles, tostadas y enchiladas, entre otras más. Mientras su mamá se encarga de atender la tienda.

Ella se levanta a las 7:00 a.m. para preparar su venta y tenerla lista a la 1:00 p.m. para después viajar hacia su destino y estar ahí a las 3:30 p.m para vender lo que ha preparado hasta regresar a su casa a las 7:00 p.m para ver a sus hijos y el siguiente día se repite la rutina.

Senia solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar más productos para su tienda como arroz, frijoles, sal, huevos, jabón, entre otros más y dar un buen servicio. Ella desea que su negocio aumente ya que ella hace su máximo esfuerzo para sus hijos, para que ellos tengan una mejor calidad de vida y brindarles el estudio, ya que es una mujer sola, responsable de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Senia appears in the photo with her little boy.  She is 34 years old and a single mother of two children, a five-year-old and a 16-month old.  Senia lives with her children and with her mother.  She has a small, home-based grocery store and she also sells fried manioc, cakes, deep fried tortillas, enchiladas and bread that she goes out to sell on foot door-to-door every day to bring her family their daily support.

Senia used to work as a domestic employee but later thought to open a small store at home which has turned out to be quite beneficial since it earns good profits.  With her mother’s support she decided to go out to sell fried manioc, cakes, deep fried tortillas and enchiladas among other things while her mother watches the store.

She rises at 7am to prepare her sale and have it ready by 1pm to go to her destination and be there by 3:30pm to sell what she’s prepared to return home at 7pm to see her children.  The next day the routine repeats itself.

Senia asked Fundación Campo for the loan to buy more products for her store like rice, beans, salt, eggs and soap, among others to provide good service.  She wants her business to grow since she make the maximum effort for her children so that they will have a better quality of life and to provide them with schooling since she’s a woman alone responsible for  her children.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Dora Auxiliadora

texts.es: La joven Dora  de 28 años de edad, labora como Tecnica de Educaciòn de Adulto desde hace 5 años años consecutivos en el Ministerio de Educaciòn; es bien reconocida en el Municipio como una mujer bien trabajadora y  muy  responsable, este crèdito lo  requiere para  pagar un solar  y de esta manera lograr su meta propuesta de construir su propia vivinda, pues actualmente viven en casa de sus padres, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo quien se desempeña como mecanico de motocicletas  ambos comparten con los gastos familiares, Su mayor sueño en la vida es que su familia permanezca unida y tener estabilidad laboral para ayudar a mi mamà.
texts.en: The young Dora is 28 years old. She has been working as a technician in adult education for five consecutive years at the Ministry of Education. She is well recognized in the town as a hardworking and responsible woman. She needs this loan to purchase a plot of land, and in this way she will achieve her goal of building her own home. Currently they live in her parents' house and she depends on the help of her spouse, who works as a motorcycle mechanic. They both share the household expenses. Her biggest dream in life is for her family to stay together and to have job stability to be able to help my mother.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land.

loans.name: William Eduardo

texts.es:
William tiene 23 años, es una  persona de buen caracter, es solidario, amigable y sobre todo responsable en su trabajo. Vive con sus padres y su hija de dos años de edad en la Provincia del Carchi.

William trabaja con sus padres en el cultivo de papas, es su primer crédito en Fodemi, el mismo va a ser invertido en la compra de fungicidas para el cultivo de papas ya que quiere cuidarlo de las plagas y del mal clima, ya que se le puede perder todo el cultivo y generaría pérdidas. Este proceso ayudaría a que William tenga buenos ingresos por el producto de calidad y así podrá invertir más y generar más ingresos en un futuro.

El sueño de William es poder trabajar independientemente para comprarse un terreno y poder construir su casa.
texts.en:
William, age 23, is a person of good character.  His is single, friendly, and above all he is responsible in his work.  He lives with his parents and his two year old daughter in the Carchi Province.

William works with parents growing potatoes.  This is his first loan with Fodemi.  He will be the one invested in the purchase of fungicides for the potato crop.  He wants to protect them from pests and bad weather because he could lose all of the crop, which would result in losses.

This process will help William to have good income due to the quality of the product.  That way he will be able to invest more and generate more income in the future.

William’s dream is to be able to work independently in order to buy a piece of land and build a house.

loans.use: to buy fungicides for the potato crop to protect them from pests and bad weather.

loans.name: Esperanza Yolanda

texts.es:
Esperanza es socia del Banco Comunal Rikchari, tiene 37 años, se dedica al alquiler de aparatos topográficos para ingeniería, es madre de 4 hijos, casada, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 4 años, Esperanza ingresó cuando tenia una tienda de abarrotes, pero su esposo la animo a poder invertir en los aparatos topográficos, le va muy bien, la ayuda que le da Finca es muy provechosa para ella, porque le ayudan a poder tener mas capital.
Con el préstamo que ha solicitado desea poder hacer el piso y puertas para una oficia en su negocio de alquiler de aparatos topográficos.
texts.en:
Esperanza, age 37, is a member of the Rikchari communal bank.  She rents out topography machines for engineering.  She is married and has four children.  She has been a member of Finca Perú for four years.  Esperanza joined when she had a grocery store.  However, her husband encouraged her invest in the topography machines.  It is going very well for her.

The help that Finca gives her is very beneficial because it helps her have more capital.  With the requested loan she wishes to be able to install a floor and doors for an office in her house.

loans.use: to install a floor and doors in her topography business

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela  es una persona que se le ha brindado financiamiento en el cual ella lo ha aprovechado porque nos explica la emprendedora que sus clientes están satisfecho con el servicio y la calidad de ropa que les ofreced. Actualmente está solicitando financiamiento para invertir en el negocio  en la compra de variedad de ropa como sabanas, mochilas, bolsos, calzado, cosméticos y ropa entre otras que ya tiene en encargos.
texts.en: Ángela is a person to whom financing has been offered, and she has taken advantage of it, because as an entrepreneur, she explains to us that her customers are satisfied with her service and the quality of the clothing that she offers them. Now she is applying for financing to invest in her business by buying a variety of items such as sheets, backpacks, bags, footwear, cosmetics, and clothing, among other items, for which she has already taken orders.

loans.use: to buy a variety of items such as sheets, backpacks, bags, footwear, cosmetics, and clothing, among other items, for which she has already taken orders.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
Ceprodel se ha caracterizado por apoyar los sueños de los educadores y docentes que con gran ahínco, a diario dan un grano de arena para el desarrollo del país por medio de la educación. La señora Josefa se dedica a la actividad de docencia en el municipio de El Sauce la cual habita ahí mismo teniendo mucha experiencia en este ramo en la enseñanza a los niños.
